title: The Storyteller: A secret formula of love and friendship
description: Bot is a robot and he wanted to make lots of friends. Every time he got close to making new friends, he realized he was missing the secret ingredient. How could he make more friends? Read this book and find out. The story of this e-book comes from great books such as Goodnight Little Monster by Helen Ketteman, The Very Hungry Caterpillar by Eric Carle, Goodnight Moon by Margaret Wise Brown and Clement Hurd, I love you forever by Robert Munsch and Sheila McGraw. *****A good book for storytime reading and for young children interested in STEM activities. Read along with science nonfiction books for an elementary cross-curricular project. The book is a great inspiration for kids who would like to become a scientist, engineer, doctor or inventor.
author: Jini S
